name: garagem_do_madeira

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch structures --watch templates --watch content --ext js,json,html --exec 'npm run build'
scripts.deploy:output: cd output && git add . && (git commit -m 'Deploy output' || echo 'Nada para commitar') && git push origin main

description: Site de not√≠cias automotivas Garagem do Madeira
